text: Hardee's is an American fast food franchise. It began on September 3, 1960. It operates mainly across the Midwestern States of the United States. The restaurant sells chicken strips, French fries and burgers. Wilbur Hardee was the founder of Hardee's. == References == Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1960 establishments in the United States Category:20th- century establishments in North Carolina Category:Companies based in North Carolina
title: Hardee's
